faq_security.question: How is my data protected?
faq_security.content:
ğŸ”’ **Your data is maximally secure:**

â€¢ **End-to-End encryption**: All documents are encrypted directly in your browser before upload
â€¢ **Zero-Knowledge**: We cannot see the content of your files
â€¢ **Personal key**: Only you have access to the decryption key
â€¢ **European servers**: Data is stored in compliance with GDPR

Your documents are safer than in a bank! ğŸ›ï¸

technical_security.question: Technical security details
technical_security.content:
ğŸ›¡ï¸ **Technical security of LegacyGuard:**

**Encryption:**
â€¢ AES-256 in GCM mode for files
â€¢ TweetNaCl for keys and metadata
â€¢ Unique nonce for each file

**Infrastructure:**
â€¢ Supabase with Row Level Security
â€¢ Clerk authentication
â€¢ EU servers (GDPR compliant)

**Key Management:**
â€¢ Client-side key generation
â€¢ PBKDF2 key derivation
â€¢ Secure key storage in IndexedDB

Your security is our top priority! ğŸ”

faq_guardians.question: What are guardians?
faq_guardians.content:
ğŸ‘¥ **Guardians are your Circle of Trust:**

â€¢ **Trusted people** who can help your family in emergencies
â€¢ **Secure access** to your important documents when needed
â€¢ **Peace of mind** knowing your family is protected
â€¢ **Flexible permissions** - you control what each guardian can see

Think of them as digital keys to help your loved ones when you can't. ğŸ”‘

add_guardian_help.question: How do I add a guardian?
add_guardian_help.content:
â• **Adding a guardian is simple:**

1. **Go to Guardians** section
2. **Click "Add Guardian"**
3. **Enter their details** (name, email, relationship)
4. **Set permissions** (what they can access)
5. **Send invitation** - they'll receive secure access

**Pro tip:** Start with your most trusted family member or friend! ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘¦

upload_help.question: How do I upload documents?
upload_help.content:
â¬†ï¸ **Uploading documents is easy:**

1. **Go to your Vault**
2. **Click "Add Document"**
3. **Drag & drop** or browse for your file
4. **Add description** (what it is, why it's important)
5. **Set expiry** (if applicable)
6. **Save** - it's automatically encrypted!

**Supported formats:** PDF, images (JPG, PNG), Word docs, and more ğŸ“

faq_progress.content:

**Guardians (30%):**
â€¢ Each trusted guardian adds ~15%
â€¢ Goal: 2+ guardians for full coverage

**Legacy Planning (30%):**
â€¢ Will creation, video messages
â€¢ Financial summaries, instructions
â€¢ Personal letters to loved ones

Every step makes your family more secure! ğŸ›¡ï¸

faq_emergency.question: What happens in an emergency?
faq_emergency.content:
ğŸš¨ **In an emergency, your guardians can:**

**Access your vault:**
â€¢ View important documents you've shared
â€¢ Get emergency contact information
â€¢ Find medical records and instructions

**Help your family:**
â€¢ Contact insurance companies
â€¢ Access bank account information
â€¢ Find legal documents like your will

**Follow your instructions:**
â€¢ Carry out your wishes
â€¢ Distribute important information
â€¢ Ensure nothing is forgotten

**Your family will know exactly what to do** because you prepared ahead! ğŸ›¡ï¸

faq_bundles.question: What are document bundles?
faq_bundles.content:
ğŸ“¦ **Document bundles organize your files smartly:**

â€¢ **Smart grouping** - AI automatically groups related documents
â€¢ **Real-world entities** - Like "Vehicle: Å koda Octavia" or "Property: 123 Main St"
â€¢ **Easy management** - Find all documents for a specific car, house, or person
â€¢ **Automatic suggestions** - New documents are linked to relevant bundles

**Example bundles:**
â€¢ Vehicle: Honda Civic (insurance, registration, service records)
â€¢ Property: Family Home (deed, insurance, utility bills)
â€¢ Financial: Bank XYZ (statements, contracts, cards)

Bundles keep your life organized automatically! ğŸ—‚ï¸

bundle_management.question: How do I manage document bundles?
bundle_management.content:
ğŸ—‚ï¸ **Managing your document bundles:**

**Automatic Creation:**
â€¢ AI detects related documents during upload
â€¢ Suggests bundle names like "Vehicle: Your Car Model"
â€¢ You can accept, modify, or skip the suggestion

**Manual Management:**
â€¢ View all bundles in your Vault
â€¢ Add documents to existing bundles
â€¢ Create new bundles for specific topics
â€¢ Rename bundles as needed

**Smart Features:**
â€¢ Version tracking within bundles
â€¢ Entity recognition (cars, houses, people)
â€¢ Cross-bundle search and filtering

Your documents stay organized effortlessly! âœ¨

simple_keywords.security: Your data is protected with end-to-end encryption, zero-knowledge architecture, and European GDPR-compliant servers.
simple_keywords.guardians: Guardians are trusted people who can help your family access important documents in emergencies.
simple_keywords.documents: Upload essential documents like ID, passport, insurance, bank info, and medical records to protect your family.
simple_keywords.bundles: Document bundles automatically group related files by topic like vehicles, properties, or financial accounts using AI.
simple_keywords.pricing: LegacyGuard offers free and paid plans. Free includes 10 documents and 2 guardians. Family plan is $9.99/month.
simple_keywords.help: I can help you upload documents, add guardians, create your will, manage bundles, or answer questions about security and features.
simple_keywords.upload: Go to your Vault and click 'Add Document' to upload files. All documents are automatically encrypted.
simple_keywords.vault: Your Vault is where all important documents are stored, safely encrypted and accessible only to you and your guardians.
simple_keywords.emergency: In emergencies, your guardians can access shared documents, get emergency contacts, and follow your instructions to help your family.
simple_keywords.legacy: Create your digital legacy by writing messages, recording videos, and setting up your will to guide your family.
simple_keywords.will: LegacyGuard helps you create a basic will through a simple 7-step process focused on protecting your loved ones.
simple_keywords.organization: AI automatically organizes your documents into smart bundles by vehicle, property, financial accounts, and other entities.
simple_keywords.search: Find documents quickly by searching bundle names, document types, or content across your entire vault.
